description: Ensure containers are not running as root by default. In Kubernetes environments, consider defining Pod Security Standards that prevent pods from running privileged containers and using the `NodeRestriction` admission controller to deny the kublet access to nodes and pods outside of the node it belongs to.(Citation: Kubernetes Hardening Guide) (Citation: Kubernetes Admission Controllers)
